system.description:
You have access to two powerful magical blasts and an assortment of other useful magical tricks. You could be many things, but it’s a fair bet that “subtle” isn’t one of them. You gain the following benefits:

  • Your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma score increases by 1, to a maximum of 20.
  • You may change your elementalist or warlock spellcasting ability to match the other class. Once made, this decision is permanent.
  • Half your elementalist levels count as warlock levels for the purpose of the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.0q5qeigzy5bv2zrq]{Extra Blast} and @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.gndmzgng98w9k3jq]{Eldritch Evolution} features.
  • Half your warlock levels count as elementalist levels for the purpose of determining the damage dealt by your @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.uit7l3mc64l5h8h1]{Elemental Blast}.
  • When you pick an @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.smfymy9fz19sc0hh]{Augment} or @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.gndmzgng98w9k3jq]{Eldritch Evolution} option, you can choose from either list.
  • You gain the @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-class-features.Item.2rfb3j6xsjn5hi24]{Eldritch Elementalism} invocation. It does not count against your invocations known.
  • Your elementalist and warlock spell points are pooled and can be used interchangeably.
system.prerequisite: 3 levels in elementalist, 3 levels in warlock
